# StopForumSpam


## Analyzers (1)

### StopForumSpam `v1.0`
Query http://www.stopforumspam.com to check if an IP or email address is a known spammer.

- **Author:** Marc-Andre Doll, STARC by EXAPROBE
- **License:** AGPL-V3
